title: Electric potentials at points on solid metal

content.description: A charge +ùëÑ is inside a hollow region in an electrically neutral piece of solid metal, as shown above. The dashed line represents a Gaussian surface within the metal that completely encloses the hollow region.
content.question: Which of the following correctly relates the electric potentials V at points X, Y, and Z ?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
